title: Classical Chinese Poetry
summary_en: A collection of classical Chinese poetry with annotations and appreciation.
summary_zh: 收录古典诗词作品，包含注释和赏析。
best_quote_en: The beauty of Chinese poetry lies in its concise yet profound expression.
best_quote_zh: 中国诗词之美在于其言简意赅而意境深远。

title: Thyroid Function Decline Syndrome Basic Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines (Practice Edition 2019)
title_zh: 甲状腺功能减退症基层诊疗指南（实践版2019）
summary_en: Clinical practice guidelines for the diagnosis and treatment of hypothyroidism at primary care level.
summary_zh: 基层医疗机构诊治甲状腺功能减退症的临床实践指南。
best_quote_en: Early diagnosis and standardized treatment are crucial for managing hypothyroidism.
best_quote_zh: 早期诊断和规范治疗对甲状腺功能减退症的管理至关重要。

title: CSDN Technical Blog Article
summary_en: A technical blog post discussing programming or IT-related topics on CSDN platform.
summary_zh: CSDN平台上讨论编程或IT相关话题的技术博客文章
best_quote_en: Sharing technical knowledge helps advance the developer community.
best_quote_zh: 技术知识分享有助于推动开发者社区进步

title: CMT Endocrine Network Article
summary_en: A medical article about endocrinology published on CMT medical platform.
summary_zh: CMT医学平台发布的内分泌学相关医学文章
best_quote_en: Advancements in endocrinology research contribute to better patient care.
best_quote_zh: 内分泌学研究进展有助于改善患者治疗

title: 我喜欢的网站
summary_en: A book introducing various interesting websites.
summary_zh: 一本介绍各类有趣网站的书籍。
best_quote_en: The internet is full of hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
best_quote_zh: 互联网上充满了等待被发现的好东西。

title: Exploring the Future of Robotics: Key Insights from Leiphone's Latest Feature
title_zh: 探索机器人技术的未来：雷峰网最新专题的核心洞察
summary_en: Leiphone's in-depth analysis on cutting-edge robotics developments, featuring expert interviews and future projections.
summary_zh: 雷峰网对尖端机器人技术的深度分析，包含专家访谈和未来展望。
best_quote_en: The next decade will see robotics transcend industrial applications to become ubiquitous in daily life.
best_quote_zh: 未来十年，机器人技术将超越工业应用，在日常生活中无处不在。

title: Literary Perspectives: Contemporary Chinese Writers' Symposium 2025
title_zh: 文学视角：2025年中国当代作家研讨会
summary_en: Coverage of the prestigious 2025 Chinese Writers Symposium featuring discussions on contemporary literary trends and creative processes.
summary_zh: 关于2025年中国作家研讨会的报道，探讨当代文学趋势与创作过程。
best_quote_en: The symposium revealed how Chinese literature is evolving to address global themes while maintaining cultural authenticity.
best_quote_zh: 研讨会揭示了中国文学如何在保持文化本真性的同时，发展出应对全球主题的新方向。

title: 臣服实验-迈克·A辛格
summary_en: A memoir by Michael A. Singer about surrendering to life's flow and the unexpected journey that followed.
summary_zh: 迈克·A·辛格关于向生命之流臣服的自传，记录随之而来的非凡人生旅程。
best_quote_en: "The surrender experiment is about letting go of personal preferences and allowing life to unfold naturally."
best_quote_zh: “臣服实验的本质是放下个人好恶，让生命自然展开。”

title: 半月谈：让基层干部从“指尖”解脱
title_zh: 半月谈：让基层干部从“指尖”解脱
summary_en: The article discusses the burden of excessive mobile apps and digital tools on grassroots cadres in China, calling for reforms to reduce unnecessary digital workload.
summary_zh: 文章探讨了中国基层干部面临的过多移动应用和数字化工具负担，呼吁改革以减少不必要的数字化工作负担。
best_quote_en: "We must resolutely prevent the digital transformation from becoming a new form of formalism that burdens grassroots workers."
best_quote_zh: "要坚决防止数字化转型异化为加重基层负担的新形式主义。"

title: 半月谈：警惕基层治理中的“痕迹主义”
title_zh: 半月谈：警惕基层治理中的“痕迹主义”
summary_en: The article analyzes the phenomenon of 'trace formalism' in grassroots governance, where excessive documentation and reporting requirements create unnecessary burdens for local officials.
summary_zh: 文章分析了基层治理中'痕迹主义'现象，即过度的文档记录和汇报要求给地方官员造成了不必要的负担。
best_quote_en: "We must shift from focusing on 'traces' to focusing on actual governance outcomes."
best_quote_zh: "必须从注重'痕迹'转向注重实际治理成效。"

title: Vintage Americana: Diner Entrance with Patriotic Decor
title_zh: 复古美国风：装饰国旗的餐厅入口
summary_en: A striking photograph capturing the nostalgic charm of a classic American diner entrance adorned with patriotic flag decorations.
summary_zh: 一张引人注目的照片，捕捉了装饰着爱国旗帜的经典美式餐厅入口的怀旧魅力。
best_quote_en: The image perfectly encapsulates mid-20th century American roadside culture.
best_quote_zh: 这张照片完美呈现了20世纪中期美国路边餐厅文化的精髓。
